text: Sam Deroo (born 29 April 1992) is a Belgian volleyball player, a member of Belgium men's national volleyball team and Russian club VC Dynamo Moscow, gold medalist of the 2013 European League, two-time Polish Champion (2016, 2017). ==Career== ===Clubs=== On May 22, 2015 he signed a contract with Polish club ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle.Sam Deroo przyjmującym ZAKSY - zaksa.pl - 22-05-2015 On April 26, 2016 he won with ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle a title of 2016 Polish Champion.Wielki finał PlusLigi: Asseco Resovia Rzeszów – ZAKSA Kędzierzyn- Koźle 0:3. ZAKSA mistrzem Polski! - plusliga.pl - 26-04-2016 In May 2016 he extended his contract till 2017.SAM DEROO I KEVIN TILLIE POZOSTAJĄ Z ZAKSĄ KĘDZIERZYN–KOŹLE W KOLEJNYM SEZONIE - zaksa.pl - 02-05-2016 ==Sporting achievements== ===Clubs=== ====National championships==== * 2010/2011 16px Belgian Cup, with Knack Randstad Roeselare * 2011/2012 16px Belgian SuperCup, with Knack Randstad Roeselare * 2015/2016 16px Polish Championship, with ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle * 2016/2017 16px Polish Cup, with ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle * 2016/2017 16px Polish Championship, with ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle * 2017/2018 16px Polish Championship, with ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle ===National team=== * 2013 16px European League ==References== ==External links== *FIVB profile *LegaVolley player profile Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian men's volleyball players Category:Belgian expatriates in Italy Category:Belgian expatriates in Poland Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Italy Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Poland Category:ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle players Category:People from Beveren Category:Modena Volley players
title: Sam Deroo
